original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postHistory as ph, votes as v, badges as b, users as u WHERE u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND u.Id = b.UserId AND p.Id = c.PostId AND p.Id = ph.PostId AND p.Id = v.PostId AND p.PostTypeId=1 AND p.CommentCount>=0 AND p.CommentCount<=12 AND p.FavoriteCount>=0 AND v.BountyAmount<=50
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.PostTypeId = 1 AND (CAST(posts.CommentCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.CommentCount AS INTEGER) <= 12) AND posts.FavoriteCount >= 0
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E5 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E2.OwnerUserId=E5.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE votes.BountyAmount <= 50
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E5E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2E5.Id=E4.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E5E4E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2E5E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2E5E4.Id=E3.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E6 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E5E4E3E6 AS SELECT * FROM E2E5E4E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E6 WHERE E2E5E4E3.OwnerUserId=E6.Id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E5E4E3E6 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E5E4E3E6 WHERE E1.PostId=E2E5E4E3E6.Id)
